amendment.description: To amend title 49, United States Code, to improve the system for enhancing automobile fuel efficiency.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1384 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 65. Record Vote Number: 309.

action.text: Amendment SA 1384 proposed by Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S9889) To amend title 49, United States Code, to improve the system for enhancing automobile fuel efficiency.
